intro: Grumilea congesta, commonly known as the clustered grumia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. Grumilea congesta is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and as a houseplant due to its attractive appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
